channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Housing market stalls as homeowners struggle to sell — ‘We’re really bleeding’
item.description: The pace of home sales was the slowest for the month of March since 2009, during the depths of the global financial crisis.

item.title: This veteran investor is known for spotting winning stocks. Here’s why he’s all-in on Nvidia and Eli Lilly.
item.description: Louis Navellier: “I’m expecting up to four Fed rate cuts and then we’ll get this turbo boost.”

item.title: ‘Bond king’ Jeffrey Gundlach predicts our next financial hangover — and it’s sobering
item.description: Easy money was never meant to last forever. Expect a 4% return on cash, 5% on bonds and 6% from stocks.

item.title: Hasbro’s stock rallies as toy maker ups its revenue forecast for ‘Wizards of the Coast’
item.description: The toy company’s first-quarter results wowed Wall Street, but its outlook excluded any impact of tariffs due to uncertainty over trade negotiations.

item.title: Comcast admits it is ‘not winning’ in fight to stanch broadband subscriber losses
item.description: Comcast has been struggling with falling broadband and cable subscriptions amid a broader industry decline.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
